stimuli.A1: What is AC coupling? Circuit that passes an AC signal while blocking a DC voltage.
stimuli.A2: What is AC/DC? Equipment that will operate on either an AC or DC power source.
stimuli.A3: What is AC generator? Device used to transform mechanical energy into AC electrical power.
